item.title: Mixed Reality and the Metaverse - A dystopian world?
item.description: In the following I’ll describe two fictional scenarios, how mixed reality technology could be abused. Some other inspiration for that can be found here The “smart”-ensurance Imagine the following scenario. You are trapped in a YouTube loophole. You’ve seen all the Gordon Ramsay-Best-Of videos and the ad’s you see are all the same for hours. You watch for the fifth time the spot of this weird new and fictional Silicon Valley Company “Exosmart”.
